item.title: London judge finds global mining giant BHP Group liable in Brazil’s worst environmental disaster
item.description: A London judge has ruled that BHP Group is liable for Brazil’s worst environmental disaster

item.title: Illegal bets in the Dominican Republic come under scrutiny after MLB pitchers arrested
item.description: Baseball and bets go hand-in-hand in the Dominican Republic, where professional athletes, musicians and even legislators go public with their wagers

item.title: German government to subsidize industry's energy prices in bid to revitalize economy
item.description: Germany’s governing coalition has agreed to subsidize energy prices for heavy industry over the next three years

item.title: Latest opioid settlement plan with OxyContin maker Purdue and Sackler

item.title: She wanted to keep her son in his school district. It was more challenging than it seemed
item.description: When families are evicted, kids' schooling is often disrupted
